title: S. Korea, Taiwan Lead EM Asia Stocks Higher, Reversing Greenland Tariff Worries
description: Emerging-market assets gained against a weaker dollar on Monday amid fresh trade tensions between the US and Europe over President Donald Trump’s push to take control of Greenland.
content: Emerging-market assets gained against a weaker dollar on Monday amid fresh trade tensions between the US and Europe over President Donald Trump’s push to take control of Greenland.
